remarks: Group subtraction (division) operation.  (Contributed by NM, 31-Mar-2014.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 13-Dec-2014.)
statement:
grpsubval.b $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
grpsubval.p $e |- .+ = ( +g ` G ) $.
grpsubval.i $e |- I = ( invg ` G ) $.
grpsubval.m $e |- .- = ( -g ` G ) $.
grpsubval $p |- ( ( X e. B /\ Y e. B ) -> ( X .- Y ) = ( X .+ ( I ` Y ) ) ) $.
